title: Baby Bib
description: neck piece fastened by two frogs; scrolled applique on pounded indigo on blue silk edged in red; bottom blue silk square bordered in black has eight irregularly shaped appliques embroidered in pink, white and green with metallic thread; separate loose applique and embroidered square attached to center of bottom section; black pounded indigo lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
